name: Python NumPy Tutorial for Beginners
title: Python NumPy Tutorial for Beginners
description: This freeCodeCamp.org YouTube tutorial introduces Python NumPy, covering arrays, mathematical functions, and data manipulation. Ideal for beginners starting with data science and Python.

name: NumPy Tutorial
title: NumPy Tutorial
description: In this Great Learning course, Bharani Akella teaches Numpy basics, including mathematical functions, array manipulations, and matrix calculations. Ideal for boosting your Python skills for AI and machine learning.

name: NumPy library in Python programming
title: NumPy library in Python programming
description: This YouTube playlist by Sundeep Saradhi Kanthety covers the essentials of the NumPy library in Python programming. Learn how to efficiently work with arrays and perform mathematical operations.

name: Data Analysis & Visualisation for Beginners (Pandas , Numpy , Matplotlib , Seaborn)
title: Uses of Pandas
description: Learn data analysis and visualization with Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, and Seaborn in this beginner-friendly YouTube playlist by Akshit Madan. Ideal for mastering essential data science skills.

name: NumPy Essential Training: 1 Foundations of NumPy
title: NumPy Essential Training: 1 Foundations of NumPy
description: In this LinkedIn Learning course, Terezija Semenski teaches NumPy essentials, covering array manipulation, indexing, and math functionsâ€”perfect for data science and machine learning foundations.

name: Data Science with NumPy, Sets, and Dictionaries
title: Data Science with NumPy, Sets, and Dictionaries
description: In this Coursera course taught by Genevieve M. Lipp, Nick Eubank, Kyle Bradbury, and Andrew D. Hilton., you'll gain skills in data analysis, Python programming, Numpy, object-oriented programming (OOP), and working with arrays, all essential for effective data science.

name: NumPy Tutorial for Beginner to Advanced
title: NumPy Tutorial for Beginner to Advanced
description: This YouTube playlist by WsCube Tech covers NumPy from beginner to advanced levels. Learn essential concepts, array manipulations, and advanced techniques for data science and Python.

name: Numpy Mastery Course 2023 (Beginner To Advanced)
title: Numpy Mastery Course 2023 (Beginner To Advanced)
description: This YouTube playlist by WsCube Tech offers a comprehensive NumPy Mastery course, covering everything from beginner to advanced concepts. Ideal for mastering NumPy for data science and Python programming in English.

name: NumPy Essential Training: 2 MatPlotlib and Linear Algebra Capabilities
title: NumPy Essential Training: 2 MatPlotlib and Linear Algebra Capabilities
description: In this LinkedIn Learning course, Terezija Semenski covers advanced NumPy and Matplotlib features, including plotting, linear algebra, and mathematical functions. Learn key techniques for data science and machine learning applications.

name: Python for Data Engineering: from Beginner to Advanced
title: Python for Data Engineering: from Beginner to Advanced
description: In this LinkedIn Learning course, Deepak Goyal teaches Python for data engineering, from basics to advanced topics. Practice through interactive challenges and complete a capstone project on retail sales analysis.
